data.title: Chancellor of University of Tun Hussein Ong Malaysia (UTHM) visited NITechï½Nagoya Institute of Technology
data.meta_description: This is the official web site of the Nagoya Institute of Technology.
data.text:
On May 29, 2023 (Monday), Vice-Chancellor Prof.Ir.Ts. Dr. RUZAIRI BIN ABDUL RAHIM and 6 members of Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia visited our university.

Following a departmental agreement in 2012, our university and UTHM concluded an inter-university academic exchange agreement in 2017, and have been promoting joint research as well as faculty and student exchanges.

During this visit, after discussing future exchanges, Professor Makoto Miyoshi, Director explained about Innovation Center for Multi-Business of Nitride Semiconductors and Professor Hisashi Sato explained his research and made a laboratory tour.

In the future, it is expected that this visit will deepen exchanges between the two universities.
